reviews.review:
Ok so since this game became free there are waaaay too many kids and waaaay too many cheaters and too much salty players. 
Bottom line
DO NOT PLAY THIS GAME IT F****G SUCKS.

Great In-game and competitive experience. Needs better Anti-Cheat. Downsides: facing frequent cheater accounts (especially in low level non prime games); the developer rarely or non - responsive to issues. Upsides: Excellent first person shooter that lives on and on; A true classic. I also love the extra fun stuff like cool weapon skins, badges and operations.
Apart from its flaws, a great game overall. So I would recommend it.

Anyway I really recommend this game
Je impozantní, jako dekadentní surrealismus v období romantického socialismu

Really fun to play with friends, but there's a lot of cons too , like Competitive is full of smurfs and misplaced ranks, soo its frustating if you wanted to play against people with the same skill level.

But overall, i enjoy the learning curve and the fun memories this game has created for me. I'll recommend it if you got friends or not. But you'll rage more if you dont have any friend in competitive.
Mesmo com prime é só cheaters ,muito bem valve ainda bem que meteram o jogo gratis.
Эта лучшая игра! Мне всё нравится только вот один - , когда ты играешь БЕЗ ЧИТОВ и тащишь игроки думаю что ты читер ну блин эт бесит!

ein sau starkes spiel wie philipp s. sagen würde. hacker gibt es nicht. teammates und gegner sind stets nett und hilfsbereit außer sie stammen aus Russland, weißrussland, ukraine, moldau, kasachstan, kirgisistan, tadschikistan, turkmenistan, usbekistan, armenien, aserbaidschan, litauen. unfreundlich sind außerdem spaghetti-esser und das land mit der blau-weiß-roten flagge, wo schon die geschichte des landes dafür sorgt, dass die croissant essenden sacklutscher viel zu schnell aufgeben. anstrengend sind außerdem portugiesen und spanier. sonst alles in butter
On of the best games ever!
